oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite album of Confederate generals
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This carte de visite album features at least forty Confederate generals including Braxton Bragg, Joseph Wheeler, Jefferson Davis, John C. Breckenridge, John Bell Hood, Stonewall Jackson, Robert E. Lee, and others. It also includes images of the McGavock Cemetery of Confederate Dead at Franklin, Tennessee and the burial site of Stonewall Jackson at Lexington, Virginia.
